articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys September Concert
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys September Concert
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed the September concert given by Unhasu Orchestra to mark the 62nd anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					 The concert began with the playing of the national anthem. Put on the stage were chorus "Our Great Country", female sextet and chorus "Fly Our Tri-Color National Flag of the Republic", female vocal solo and chorus "My Country" and other colorful numbers.
					
					 Through their performance replete with revolutionary enthusiasm and optimism and rich emotion the performers enthusiastically sang of the happiness of the working people leading a worthwhile life under the care of the DPRK, which brought about epoch-making miracles and changes and daily prospered under wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and truthfully represented the unshakable faith and will of the army and people of the DPRK to further consolidate the Korean-style socialist system centered on the popular masses as an invincible fortress, single-mindedly united around the Party.
					
					  Kim Jong Il expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the artistes of the Unhasu Orchestra presented a splendid concert rich in ideological contents and high in artistry by displaying revolutionary traits of creation. He extended thanks to them, highly estimating their successful performance.
					
					 He expressed expectation and conviction that the creators and artistes of the orchestra would conduct dynamic revolutionary and militant art creative activities in the future, too to powerfully encourage the army and people in the sacred struggle for accomplishing the cause of building a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation.
					
					 Among the audience were Jang Song Thaek, vice-chairman of the NDC of the DPRK and department director of the WPK Central Committee, Secretaries Choe Thae Bok and Kim Ki Nam and other leading officials of the WPK Central Committee, Korean People's Army General Kim Jong Gak, member of the NDC of the DPRK and first vice-director of the KPA General Political Bureau, KPA General Ri Yong Ho, chief of the KPA General Staff, and other commanding officers of the army and armed forces organs.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Reply Message to Hu Jintao
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Reply Message to Hu Jintao
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il Wednesday sent a message to Hu Jintao, president of the People's Republic of China, in reply to the message of sympathy he sent as regards heavy flood that hit some areas of the DPRK.
					 The message said:
					
					 I express my thanks to you for sending the message of sympathy in connection with the fact that some parts of our country were hard hit by heavy flood. 
					
					 Availing myself of this opportunity, I would like to wish you fresh success in your responsible work.

articles.title: Greeting Message from Chinese Leadership
articles.content:
Greeting Message from Chinese Leadership
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il and Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, and Choe Yong Rim, premier of the Cabinet, received a message of greetings in the joint name of Hu Jintao, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, president of the People's Republic of China and chairman of the Central Military Commission of the People's Republic of China, and Wu Bangguo, chairman of the Standing Committee of the Chinese National People's Congress, and Wen Jiabao, premier of the State Council, on Sept. 8 on the occasion of the 62nd birthday of the DPRK.
					 The message says:
					
					 We extend warm congratulations to you and, through you, to the Workers' Party of Korea and the government and fraternal people of the DPRK on behalf of the Communist Party of China and the government and people of China on the occasion of the 62nd birthday of the DPRK.
					
					 The foundation of the DPRK made it possible for the Korean people to take the new road of building a socialist state as the masters of the country and opened the new chapter in the history of Korea.
					
					 The Korean people have achieved delightful successes in the socialist revolution and construction in the spirit of self-reliance and fortitude under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 We are sincerely rejoiced over this and wholeheartedly wish the Korean people steady, fresh and greater success in all fields.
					
					 China and the DPRK are the friendly neighbors linked with the same mountain and rivers.
					
					 The traditional Sino-DPRK friendship personally provided and boosted by the leaders of the elder generation of the two countries stood the ordeal of the changed international situation and became the common valuable asset of the two parties, the two countries and the two peoples.
					
					 We, together with the DPRK side, will continue to boost the exchange and cooperation in all the domains of the two countries in the spirit of "inheriting tradition, facing up to the future, building good neighborly friendship and strengthening cooperation" and put spurs to the sustainable development of the Sino-DPRK relations so as to bring the two peoples better welfare and defend the peace and stability of the region.
					
					 We wish the DPRK prosperity and its people happiness.

articles.title: Greeting Message from Russian President
articles.content:
Greeting Message from Russian President
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a message of greetings from President of the Russian Federation D. Medvedev on Thursday on the occasion of the 62nd birthday of the DPRK.
					 The message said:
					
					 Your Excellency respected chairman,
					
					 Please accept my congratulations to you on the occasion of the 62nd birthday of the DPRK.
					
					 The traditional relations of good-neighborly friendship exist between our two countries.
					
					 I am convinced that the boosted relations between Russia and the DPRK would be in line with the fundamental interests of the two peoples and make contribution to ensuring the peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Asia as a whole.   
					
					 Your Excellency Kim Jong Il,
					
					 I wish you good health and success and the people of the DPRK happiness and prosperity.

articles.title: Greeting Message from Cuban President
articles.content:
Greeting Message from Cuban President
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il together with Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received a congratulatory message from Raul Castro Ruz, president of the Council of Ministers and president of the Council of State of Cuba, on Thursday on the occasion of the 62nd birthday of the DPRK.
					 The message said:
					
					 Extending the warmest congratulations to you on the 62nd birthday of the DPRK, I would like to reconfirm my will to continue to boost the fraternal relations between the two countries.
					
					 I offer fraternal salute to you.

articles.title: Floral Baskets form Cambodian King and Great King
articles.content:
Floral Baskets form Cambodian King and Great King
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Norodom Sihamoni, king of Cambodia, and Norodom Sihanouk, great king of Cambodia, sent large floral baskets to the DPRK embassy in Phnom Penh on the occasion of the 62nd birthday of the DPRK.
					Upon the authorization of the king and the great king, the Royal Palace Ministry delegation of Cambodia led by the senior minister in charge of the Royal Palace visited the DPRK embassy on September 3 to lay the baskets before the portraits of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The senior minister said that all the Cambodians wish the people of the DPRK great successes in building a great prosperous and powerful nation under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il and expressed expectation that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to develop in the future.

articles.title: Banquet Hosted by DPRK Government
articles.content:
Banquet Hosted by DPRK Government
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The DPRK government hosted a banquet at the People's Palace of Culture on Thursday in celebration of the 62nd birthday of the DPRK.
					 Present there were senior party, army and state officials, chairpersons of friendly parties, deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly, leading officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, pro-reunification patriotic champions who are former unconverted long-term prisoners, officials of the fields of science, education, culture and art, public health and media, heroes, those of merits, the congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan, and a delegation of overseas compatriots and other compatriots and the chief of the Pyongyang Mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front. 
					
					 Present there on invitation were diplomatic envoys, members of the military attaches corps here, representatives of international organizations here and other foreigners.
					
					Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, addressing the banquet said that the 60-odd year-long history of the DPRK is the history of glorious revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il. The President's idea on nation-building and his exploits have been thoroughly preserved and successfully carried forward by 
						Kim Jong Il, he said, and went on:
					
					Kim Jong Il advanced the idea and theory of nation-building centered on the leader for the first time in history and has successfully embodied them, thus developing the DPRK into the country of 
						Kim Il Sung. He has also pursued the Songun politics in all fields, defending the destiny of the country and the nation and turning it into a political and ideological power, a military power and a scientific and technical power.
					
					 It is thanks to Kim Jong Il's ardent patriotism, bold political decision, energetic external activities that the June 15 era of reunification advancing in the idea of "By our nation itself" was ushered in this land, the dignity and position of Songun Korea have further risen and the international solidarity with the Korean revolution has remarkably grown stronger.
					
					 The DPRK will always hold Kim Il Sung as the sun of Juche, glorify his idea on nation-building and exploits performed by him through generations and resolutely defend and carry out the line and politics of the WPK under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Senior party and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, leading officials of party and armed forces organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions visited the Kumsusan Memorial Palace on Thursday on the occasion of the 62nd birthday of the DPRK.
					 Placed before the statue of President Kim Il Sung was a floral basket in the joint name of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and its Central Military Commission, the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly and the Cabinet of the DPRK. 
					
					 The senior party and state officials paid humble respect to the statue of the President.
					
					 The participants made bows in profound reverence to the President, founder and builder of the Republic.
					
					 Commanding officers of the Korean People's Army, the anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters, servicepersons of the KPA and working people from all walks of life visited the palace on the same day.
					
					 Foreigners and overseas compatriots also visited the palace to pay homage to the President. They included the diplomatic corps, the military attaches corps and representatives of the international organizations here, Vishwanath, secretary-general of the International Kim Il Sung Prize Council and director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, a congratulatory group of the Korean residents in Japan for celebrating the 62nd birthday of the DPRK led by Pak Ku Ho, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan and a congratulatory group of the General Association of Koreans in China headed by Vice Director Kim Yong Hui.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Floral baskets were placed before the statues of President
					 Kim Il Sung on the occasion of the 62nd birthday of the DPRK.
					 Servicepersons of the Korean People's Army, working people of all strata, school youth and children and overseas Koreans visited the statue of Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill in Pyongyang. 
					
					Seen before the statue was a floral basket from General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Placed before the statue were floral baskets in the name of the Party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, organs of science, education, culture and arts, public health, media, industrial establishments, schools, etc.
					
					 Also laid was a floral basket in the name of the Pyongyang Mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 The participants paid tribute to him in humble reverence.
					
					 Floral baskets, bouquets and flowers were also placed before the statues of Kim Il Sung in significant places in the capital and different parts of the country.

articles.title: Wreaths Laid before Martyrs' Cemeteries
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid before Martyrs' Cemeteries
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid before the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong and the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery and floral baskets before the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Memorial Tower on Thursday on the occasion of the 62nd birthday of the DPRK. 
					Seen on the wreath-laying stands at the cemeteries were wreaths sent by General Secretary
						 Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Present at ceremonies of laying wreaths and floral baskets were senior army and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the organs of the party, armed forces and government, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the Korean People's Army and working people in Pyongyang. 
					
					 Wreaths in the name of the WPK Central Committee, the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly and the Cabinet were laid on the wreath-laying stands at the martyrs cemeteries.
					
					 A floral basket in the joint name of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the WPK was laid before the main theme sculpture "Victory" of the memorial tower. 
					
					 Then, laid before the martyrs cemeteries and the memorial tower were wreaths and floral baskets in the name of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security, working people's organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the KPA, organs of science, education, public health and media, and party and power organs, factories and farms in Pyongyang and bouquets. 
					
					 The participants paid silent tribute in memory of the martyrs who devoted their all to the liberation of the country, the freedom and happiness of the people, the prosperity of the country and the victory of the Songun revolutionary cause. They also paid deep respects to the servicepersons of the heroic Korean People's Army who achieved the historic victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War and honorably defended the sovereignty of the country and gains of the revolution.
					
					 Wreaths were also laid before statues of martyrs, the monuments to the fallen fighters of the KPA and martyrs' cemeteries and graves in different parts of the country on the same day.

articles.title: Floral Basket from Diplomatic Corps
articles.content:
Floral Basket from Diplomatic Corps
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket and a congratulatory message by the diplomatic corps here on the occasion of the 62nd birthday of the DPRK.
					 The floral basket and the congratulatory letter were conveyed to Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun by Martin Tomco, Czech ambassador to the DPRK who is doyen of the corps, on Thursday.

articles.title: Dancing Parties Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties Held
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students took place in various parts of the country on Thursday on the occasion of the 62nd anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					 At the dancing places held in Pyongyang including the plazas of the Party Founding Memorial Tower, the April 25 House of Culture and the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium the youth and students merrily danced to the tune of songs including "Let's Sing of Our Pride in Being under the Guidance of the General" and "Fly Our Tri-color National Flag of the Republic".
					
					The participants presented sea of dancers to the tune of "Our General Is the Best" and other songs. They recalled with deep emotion the undying Songun revolutionary feats performed by General Secretary Kim Jong Il who has demonstrated the might of Kim Il Sung's Korea, while making the ceaseless journey of patriotic dedication.
					
					 Dancing to the tune of songs "My Motherland Is Immensely Good" and "Do Prosper, Era of the Workers' Party" they hardened their firm faith and will to glorify the feats of President Kim Il Sung in the nation-building under the guidance of the Party for all ages. 
					
					 Dancing parties took place in different parts of the country on the same day.

articles.title: National Day Celebrated in Pyongyang
articles.content:
National Day Celebrated in Pyongyang
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea greets its 62nd birthday on Thursday.
					On this occasion, a large number of servicepersons and citizens from all walks of life have visited President Kim Il Sung's statues in different parts of Pyongyang, including Mansu Hill, to place floral baskets and bouquets before them with deep reverence for him, who founded the DPRK.
					
					The State Symphony Orchestra, Mansudae Art Troupe, Pyongyang Circus and other national art troupes have given performances in celebration of the national day, praising the President's ideas and feats concerning the state building and demonstrating the determination of the Korean army and people to strive for the building of a thriving socialist nation under the banner of the Republic, closely rallied around General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					Public catering establishments such as the Okryu and Chongnyu restaurants in the city are decked in festive attire and serve national dishes.
					
					Seen in the streets are DPRK flags, red flags and placards bearing such inscriptions as "September 9," "Single-hearted unity," "Thriving nation" and "Country where the people are the masters."
					
					With monumental edifices and streets newly decorated with electric lights, the city presents a wonderful view in the evening, giving zest to people enjoying the holiday.

articles.title: Chinese Associations Host Reception
articles.content:
Chinese Associations Host Reception
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The Chinese People's Association for Friendship with Foreign Countries and the China-Korea Friendship Association hosted a reception in Beijing Tuesday on the occasion of the 62nd anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Present there on invitation were Ambassador Choe Pyong Gwan and staff members of the DPRK embassy in Beijing.
					
					 On hand were Wu Donghe, chairman of the China-Korea Friendship Association, and officials concerned including those of the Chinese People's Association for Friendship with Foreign Countries, the International Liaison Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, the Ministry of National Defense, etc.
					
					Wu Donghe in a speech said that General Secretary Kim Jong Il's another visit to China in less than half a year fully showed what great importance the parties and governments of the two countries attach to the Sino-DPRK friendship and how close the traditional bilateral friendship is, expressing conviction that his recent visit to China would surely inject fresh vigor and vitality into the good-neighborly and friendly relations between the two countries.
					
					 He wished the fraternal Korean people greater success in their efforts to develop economy, improve the standard of people's living and open the gate to a thriving socialist nation at an early date and hoped for the successful conference of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 He would work hard together with Korean comrades to make fresh contribution to further deepening the traditional friendship between the two peoples, he stressed.
					
					 Choe Pyong Gwan spoke high praises of the immortal exploits President Kim Il Sung performed by turning the DPRK into a socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence, and referred to the fact that the DPRK has fully displayed its might century after century under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The DPRK-China friendship provided and developed by the revolutionaries of the elder generation of the two countries has grown stronger in all fields under the deep concern of the top leaders of the two countries, he noted.
					
					 He expressed the will to continue to make efforts together with the Chinese side to consolidate and develop the traditional DPRK-China friendship generation after generation.

articles.title: Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Cuba
articles.content:
Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Cuba
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- A reception was given at the DPRK embassy in Havana on Sept. 3 to mark the 62nd anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Present there on invitation were the minister of Construction, Vice-Foreign Minister Ana Teresita Gonzalez, First Vice-Minister of Foreign Investment and Economic Cooperation Orlando Hernandez and Its Vice-Minister Ramon Ripol, First Vice-President of the Institute of Friendship with the Peoples Enrique Roman Hernandez, the coordinator for Asian Affairs of the International Department of the C.C., the Communist Party of Cuba, First Vice-Chairman of the Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification of Cuba Juan Jose Leon Vega and officials concerned.
					
					 On hand were Ambassador Kwon Sung Chol and staff members of the DPRK embassy in Havana.

articles.title: Congratulatory Letter from AINDF
articles.content:
Congratulatory Letter from AINDF
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a congratulatory letter by the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) on Sept. 9 on the occasion of the 62nd birthday of the DPRK.
					 The letter said:
					
					 The foundation of the DPRK made it possible for the people of the DPRK to have a tight hold on their destinies as masters of the state sovereignty for the first time in the nation's history spanning 5 000 years and usher in the new era of social progress and the building of a rich and powerful country. The foundation also provided all the Koreans with the genuine motherland founded in line with their own will and desire.
					
					 The history of the DPRK is the course of victory and glory in which the Korean people have defended and glorified the revolutionary character of the country as a socialist state centered on the popular masses, while meeting all challenges of history and braving the ordeals under the guidance of the great leaders. It also represents the brilliant annals of creation and changes in which the Korean people have brought about the great changes and performed miracles in the revolution and construction and dashed ahead like the wind toward the high eminence of a thriving nation.
					
					 The shining annals of the DPRK adorned with the victory and glory are decorated with the undying feats performed by you as you ushered in the great heyday of Juche Korea by successfully carrying forward President Kim Il Sung's cause of nation-building for several decades.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are now bringing about landmark changes on all fronts of building a thriving nation to greet the 65th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea as the great festival of victors full of confidence in sure victory and optimism and demonstrating the inexhaustible strength of the country all over the world upholding the slogan of faith "Korea can do anything once it is determined!" as they are led by you who is opening the rosy future of the country under the uplifted banner of Songun.
					
					 The letter calls upon all the vanguard fighters of the AINDF and other patriotic people from all walks of life to accomplish the historic cause of national reunification with single-minded fidelity under your Songun leadership.

articles.title: People Called on to Wage Struggle for Prosperity of Country
articles.content:
People Called on to Wage Struggle for Prosperity of Country
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Papers Thursday editorially call upon all the people to work harder under the Songun revolutionary leadership General Secretary of Kim Jong Il to make the country rich and prosperous and achieve the victory in the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					 Rodong Sinmun notes that the foundation of the DPRK on September 9, Juche 37 (1948) by President Kim Il Sung was a historic event which opened up the new era of building a socialist state based on the Juche idea.
					
					The foundation of the DPRK made it possible for the Korean people to become the master of the state and the society and the independent and creative people carving out their destinies with firm grip on them for the first time in the nation's history spanning 5,000 years. The foundation also provided them with a powerful political weapon for dynamically pushing forward the socialist cause, the paper notes, and goes on:
					
					 The DPRK founded and developed by the President has dynamically advanced toward the rosy future of a thriving nation under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Thanks to his wise leadership, the DPRK has developed into the representative of the independent rights of the popular masses, the organizer of their creative abilities and activities, the master in charge of people's living and the protector of their interests.
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il clarified the principle of the Songun revolution that the army precisely means the party, the state and the people and formulated the Songun politics as the basic political mode under socialism, thereby providing a sure guarantee for the eternal victory of the DPRK. This is the immortal and shining exploit performed by him.
					
					 His Songun idea and politics serve as a torchlight indicating the way of the era and a treasured sword of independence for carving out the future of the country and the people.
					
					 The DPRK does everything according to its own idea and faith in line with the demand and interests of its people no matter what others may say. It is its independent spirit. "Korea can do anything once it is determined!" This represents the self-confidence and pluck of socialist Korea dignified with independence. 
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are now performing world-startling heroic feats and undying miracles through a great surge with the might of the single-minded unity.
					
					 Minju Joson says that the DPRK has prospered as a socialist state of Juche with invincible might under the wise leadership of the great leader and the great party, stressing that it will always shine as the country of Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Eternal President of DPRK
articles.content:
Eternal President of DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- The Korean people deeply revere Kim Il Sung as eternal President of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, adding luster to the imperishable exploits performed by him.
					 He, elected the first President of the Republic, enjoying support of the entire Korean people, devoted his whole life to the country and the people.
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il manifested his unshakable will to venerate Kim Il Sung, who performed distinguished feats for the country and the people and for the world and humanity, as the sole and eternal President in the history of Korea. 
					
					 Thanks to the leader's infinite fidelity and moral obligation, the socialist constitution was revised and renamed Kim Il Sung Constitution at the 1st Session of the 10th Supreme People's Assembly held on September 5, Juche 87 (1998) to codify his Juche-based ideas and feats concerning the state building.
					
					In the preface the constitution stipulates that the presidency of the DPRK is the title proper to
						 Kim Il Sung only and that he will always remain the President of the Republic.
					
					 The unique constitution reflects the unanimous will and desire of all the Korean people, including the servicepersons, to respect him for all ages as founder of socialist Korea and eternal President of the Republic.
					
					Greeting the anniversary of the Republic, the Korean people renew their determination to work hard for the prosperity of Kim Il Sung's Korea under the Songun leadership of General Secretary
						 Kim Jong Il, holding the President in high esteem.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Tajik President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Tajik President
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a message of greetings to Emomali Rahmon, President of Tajikistan, on the occasion of its national day.
					 Kim in his message wished him success in his work for the welfare and prosperity of the Tajik people.

articles.title: DPRK's Birthday Celebrated by Chongryon
articles.content:
DPRK's Birthday Celebrated by Chongryon
 Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- A lecture was given by the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) at the Korean Hall in Tokyo on September 7 to celebrate the 62nd birthday of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea. 
					 Present there were Ho Jong Man, chief vice-chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, and other officials of Chongryon. 
					
					 The participants watched video-lecture "Our Homeland Effects Fresh Surge in Improving the Standard of People's Living".

articles.title: Congratulatory Message from Chongryon
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message from Chongryon
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il Thursday received a congratulatory message from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on the occasion of the 62nd birthday of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The congratulatory message said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung founded the dignified DPRK, put forward the Koreans in Japan as members of an independent and sovereign state and formed Chongryon, an overseas compatriot organization, and led it with warm loving care. His wise guidance helped Chongryon cover the patriotic and worthwhile path with the honor of having set an example in the worldwide overseas compatriot movement.  
					
					 You perfectly embodied the Juche idea founded by the President and his theory of nation-building, its application, and weathered the stern hardships with the great leadership of Songun, thus working miracles in defending the country and building a thriving nation. You are a symbol of dignity and glory of Korea and the banner of all victories. 
					
					 Chongryon shares the same destiny with the country as taught by you. Chongryon and the Koreans in Japan would defend the country, always sharing their destinies with the socialist homeland under any circumstances and thus make tangible contribution to building a thriving nation with firm creed that their happiness is guaranteed only when they defend the country and make it rich and powerful.
					
					 We would join in a nationwide struggle for the country's reunification under the banner of "By our nation itself" and push forward the work to consolidate the friendly relations with the Japanese people and international solidarity.

articles.title: Important Day of DPRK Observed
articles.content:
Important Day of DPRK Observed 
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- Round-table talks and a film show took place in Russia, opening ceremonies of the Pyongyang Cultural Center and a Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibition in Peru and a seminar in Nigeria between August 23 and 25 on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 On display in the venues of the events were works of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, photos on their Songun leadership exploits, books introducing great vitality of the Songun politics and handicrafts representing the wisdom and skills of the Korean people.
					
					 Speeches were made at the functions.
					
					 The president of the General Kim Jong Il Peruvian Amicable Institute said that through the wide organization of colorful functions on the occasions of important anniversaries of the DPRK at the Pyongyang Cultural Center the organization would introduce among the Peruvian people the Korean people in their efforts to build a great prosperous and powerful nation true to the outstanding Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il, while standing firm against the U.S. imperialists' moves to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 Speakers including the chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Songun Politics at a seminar on the theme of "Philosophical principle of the Juche idea and issue of philosophy in Africa" in Nigeria said that the Juche idea expounds the idea that man should have a firm hold on his destiny and act according to his faith and wish. All of us should deeply grasp the great Juche idea brightly illuminating the way of independent development, they added.
					
					 A message of greetings to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the function in Peru.

articles.title: Seminar Held in Mexico to Mark DPRK's Birthday
articles.content:
Seminar Held in Mexico to Mark DPRK's Birthday 
Pyongyang, September 9 (KCNA) -- A joint seminar on the theme of "DPRK demonstrating its might by dint of Songun" took place in Mexico on Aug. 26 on the occasion of the 62nd anniversary of the foundation of the DPRK.
					On display in the venue were works of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and publications introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Ramon Jimenez Lopez, president of the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism who is president of the Mexican National Coordinating Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, noted in his speech at the seminar that the DPRK is Korean-style state that was founded to suit the specific conditions of Korea and the desire of the people, guided by the Juche idea and a peculiar socialist state centered on the popular masses in which the people are the masters of everything and everything serves them.
					
					Noting that Kim Jong Il has steadily consolidated and developed the DPRK into the Juche-oriented socialist state with the invincible might with his Songun revolutionary leadership, he said that the DPRK advancing under Kim Jong Il's Songun revolutionary leadership will always shine as
						 Kim Il Sung's Korea.
					
					 Juan Campos Vega, chairman of the Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea, and other speakers spoke with high appreciation that the President set forth the original idea on state-building and built the socialist power -- independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence -- and that Kim Jong Il developed the DPRK into an invincible power.
					
					 Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the C.C., the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, released a statement on Sept. 1 on the same occasion.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia "concierto de septiembre"
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia "concierto de septiembre"
Pyongyang, 9 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, junto con los oficiales y soldados del EPC, presencio el "Concierto de septiembre" del Coro Estatal Benemerito dedicado al 62o aniversario de la fundacion de la RPDC.
					En la funcion iniciada con la interpretacion del Himno Nacional se presentaron diversas piezas como el coro masculino "Que reciba saludo", el solo y coro masculinos "Oh, mi Corea", el coro masculino "!Que prospere la epoca del Partido del Trabajo!", el duo y coro masculinos "Vivimos en el mejor regimen" y "Hemos comenzado de la nada", el coro masculino "Que conquiste la cumbre de la tecnica de punta", "El camino de victoria" y "Aspecto de Corea". 
					
					Al ofrecer este espectaculo de caracter revolucionario y combativo, los ejecutantes cantaron la orgullosa trayectoria llena de victorias y glorias, que han recorrido siguiendo la bandera de la RPDC, poderosa arma de la construccion socialista y cuna de felicidad del pueblo coreano. 
					
					Igualmente, mostraron bien la ferrea conviccion y voluntad, el impetu combativo y la disposicion de nuestro ejercito y pueblo de defender a costa de la vida la Direccion de la Revolucion superando cualesquier pruebas y dificultades con la bandera roja de la revolucion en lo mas alto y llevar a feliz termino generacion tras generacion la causa revolucionaria del Juche siguiendo la direccion del partido.
					
					El Dirigente se mostro muy satisfecho de que los artistas del Coro Estatal Benemerito hayan ofrecido este magnifico concierto en que palpita fuertemente el espiritu de Corea, o sea, el espiritu revolucionario del Paektu, y les expreso agradecimiento.
					
					Dijo que el Coro Estatal Benemerito, banda artistica prestigiosa e influyente, es un orgullo de nuestro pueblo y un patrimonio valioso del pais y expreso su esperanza y conviccion de que los creadores y los artistas del coro desplegaran con mas dinamismo las actividades artisticas y creativas de caracter combativo para estimular fuertemente al ejercito y al pueblo a la sagrada lucha por cumplir la causa de construccion de la gran potencia prospera socialista. 
					
					Le acompanaron en ver la funcion el vicepresidente del CDN de la RPDC y jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek, los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui y Thae Jong Su, y otros cuadros directivos del CC del PTC, los generales de ejercito del EPC, Kim Myong Guk, Kim Won Hong, Hyon Chol Hae y otros miembros de mando del ejercito y los organismos de las fuerzas armadas.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il envía mensaje de respuesta a Hu Jintao
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il envía mensaje de respuesta a Hu Jintao
 Pyongyang, 9 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il envió el día 8 un mensaje de respuesta al Presidente de la República Popular China, Hu Jintao, con motivo de que éste le ha enviado el mensaje de consuelo por las pérdidas que ocurrieron en algunas zonas de Corea por inundaciones. 
					 La misiva señala:
					
					 Quisiera agradecerle a Usted por haberme enviado un mensaje de consuelo por las pérdidas causadas por inundaciones en algunas zonas de nuestro país.
					
					 Aprovecho esta oportunidad para desearle nuevos éxitos en su trabajo responsable.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe mensaje de felicitacion de dirigentes chinos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe mensaje de felicitacion de dirigentes chinos
Pyongyang, 9 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, recibio junto con el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, Kim Yong Nam, y el primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros, Choe Yong Rim, un mensaje de felicitacion que con motivo del 62o aniversario de la fundacion de la RPDC, les enviaran el dia 8 a nombre comun el Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China y Presidente de la Republica Popular China y de la Comision Militar Central de la RPCh, Hu Jintao, el presidente del Comite Permanente de la Asamblea Popular Nacional, Wu Bangguo, y el primer ministro del Consejo de Estado, Wen Jiabao.
					La misiva senala como sigue:
					
					Con motivo del 62o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, enviamos, en representacion del Partido Comunista de China, el gobierno y el pueblo de China, nuestras calidas felicitaciones a Ustedes, y por su conducto, al Partido del Trabajo de Corea, al gobierno y al hermano pueblo de Corea.
					
					Gracias a la fundacion de la RPDC, el pueblo coreano entro en el nuevo camino de la construccion del Estado socialista siendo dueno del pais y abrio la nueva pagina de la historia de Corea.
					
					Bajo la direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung, el Secretario General Kim Jong Il y el Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el pueblo coreano ha alcanzado los exitos plausibles en la revolucion socialista y la causa de construccion poniendo de manifiesto su espiritu de autoconfianza y de lucha tenaz.
					
					Nos alegramos sinceramente de ello y deseamos de todo corazon que el pueblo coreano logre incesantemente mayores y nuevos exitos en todas las esferas.
					
					China y Corea son vecinos amistosos colindados por montanas y rios en el medio.
					
					La tradicional amistad China-Corea, preparada y desarrollada por los dirigentes de generacion veterana de los dos paises, ha superado las pruebas de la situacion internacional cambiada y se hizo una preciosa riqueza comun de los partidos y los pueblos de ambos paises.
					
					Nosotros, junto con la parte coreana, seguiremos profundizando el intercambio y la cooperacion en distintos dominios de los dos paises e impulsando el incesante desarrollo de las relaciones China-Corea, segun el espiritu de "la continuacion de tradicion, la aspiracion al futuro, la buena vecindad y el fortalecimiento de cooperacion". De esta manera, procuraremos el mejor bienestar a los pueblos de los dos paises y defenderemos la paz y la estabilidad de esta region.
					
					Formulamos votos por la prosperidad de la RPDC y la felicidad del pueblo.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe mensaje de felicitacion del presidente ruso
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe mensaje de felicitacion del presidente ruso
 Pyongyang, 9 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le dirigiera el dia 9 el Presidente de la Federacion Rusa, Dmitri Anatolievich Medvedev, con motivo del 62o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					 La misiva sigue abajo:
					
					 Su Excelencia estimado Presidente, 
					
					 Le hago llegar mis felicitaciones con motivo del 62o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					 Entre nuestros dos paises existen las tradicionales relaciones de buena vecindad. 
					
					 Estoy seguro de que el constante fortalecimiento de las relaciones entre Rusia y la RPDC conviene a los intereses fundamentales de los pueblos de ambos paises y contribuira a la preservacion de la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y de toda region asiatica.
					
					 Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il,
					
					 Le deseo buena salud y exitos, y al pueblo de la RPDC, la felicidad y la prosperidad.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Raul Castro Ruz
Pyongyang, 9 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, junto con el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, Kim Yong Nam, recibio el mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el dia 9 el Segundo Secretario del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Cuba y Presidente de los Consejos de Estado y de Ministros de la Republica de Cuba, Raul Castro Ruz, en ocasion del 62o aniversario de la fundacion de la RPDC.
					El mensaje senala como sigue:
					
					Queridos companeros,
					
					Les extiendo, en ocasion del 62o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, las mas calidas felicitaciones y les reafirmo la voluntad de seguir fortaleciendo y ampliando las relaciones fraternales entre nuestros paises.
					
					Reciban un fraternal saludo.

articles.title: Periodicos se refieren al maravilloso futuro de la RPDC
articles.content:
Periodicos se refieren al maravilloso futuro de la RPDC
Pyongyang, 9 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Los periodicos capitalinos publicaron hoy sendos editoriales llamando a todos a luchar con mas vigor por la prosperidad de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y el triunfo de la causa revolucionaria del Juche bajo la guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun.
					 El Presidente Kim Il Sung fundo el 9 de septiembre del 37 (1948) de la Era Juche la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, lo cual fue un evento historico que dio inicio a la construccion del Estado socialista basado en la idea Juche.
					
					 Senala asi el periodico Rodong Sinmun y continua:
					
					 Gracias a la fundacion de la RPDC, la nacion coreana pudo convertirse por primera vez en la historia nacional de cinco mil anos en el dueno del Estado y la sociedad y en el pueblo independiente y creador, que forja con sus propias fuerzas su destino, y contar con la poderosa arma politica con que puede impulsar dinamicamente la causa socialista.
					
					 Hoy dia, la RPDC fundada y desarrollada por el Presidente avanza a pasos firmes hacia el futuro brillante de la gran potencia prospera bajo la guia del Songun del Dirigente.
					
					 Bajo la sabia orientacion del Dirigente, la RPDC se hizo la representante de los derechos independientes de las masas populares, la organizadora de la capacidad y actividad creativa de ellas, la responsable de la vida del pueblo y la protectora de los intereses populares.
					
					 El Dirigente aclaro el principio revolucionario del Songun segun el cual el ejercito es precisamente el partido, el Estado y el pueblo, y formulo la politica de Songun como principal modo de la politica socialista, lo cual deviene su inmortal proeza que preparo la garantia de victoria eterna de la RPDC.
					
					 La idea y politica del Dirigente basadas en el Songun  resultan la antorcha que ilumina la senda de la epoca y el medio omnipotente de la independencia para forjar el futuro de la patria y el pueblo.
					
					  La RPDC hace lo todo segun su idea y conviccion y conforme a la demanda e intereses del pueblo sin hacer caso de lo que digan los otros. He aqui precisamente el impetu independiente de ella.
					
					  La consigna "!Si Corea decide, lo cumple!" refleja el temperamento y el coraje de la Corea socialista altamente dignificada por su postura independiente.
					
					  Hoy, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea crean con el poderio de la unidad monolitica las proezas heroicas e indelebles milagros del gran auge que asombran a todo el mundo.
					
					  Por su parte, el periodico Minju Joson enfatiza que la RPDC, que bajo la sabia direccion del gran lider y del gran dirigente, ha venido prosperando como Estado socialista del Juche con invencible poderio, brillara eternamente como pais del Presidente       Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje al presidente de Tadjikistan
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje al presidente de Tadjikistan
 Pyongyang, 9 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio este jueves un mensaje al presidente de la Republica de Tadjikistan, Emomali Rahmon, para felicitarle por el Dia Nacional de su pais. 
					 El remitente desea al destinatario exitos en su trabajo para el bienestar y la prosperidad del pueblo de Tadjikistan.
